mapper.select: SELECT p.product_num productCode, p.business_num businessCode, p.number_id arriveType, p.trade_face tradeFace, p.price price, pg.discount discount, p.special_type specialType FROM lfs_userrelationptgroup ug, lfs_productrelationgroup pg, lfs_product p, lfs_productgroup g WHERE ug.user_num = #{agtNo} AND ug.group_num = pg.group_num AND pg.product_num = p.product_num AND g.group_num = ug.group_num AND p.state = 1 AND g.group_state = 1 AND pg.product_state = 1 AND p.product_type = #{productType} and p.trade_face = #{chargeMoney} and p.business_num = #{businessCode} limit 1

select p.product_num productCode,p.business_num businessCode,p.number_id arriveType, p.trade_face tradeFace, p.price,pg.discount,b.business_name businessName from lfs_userrelationptgroup ug,lfs_productrelationgroup pg,lfs_product p ,lfs_productgroup g,lfs_businesstype b where ug.user_num=#{agtNo} and ug.group_num=pg.group_num and pg.product_num = p.product_num and g.group_num = ug.group_num and p.business_num = b.business_num and p.state=1 and g.group_state=1 and pg.product_state = 1
select channel_num channelNo, c.channel_name channelName,c.channel_detail channelDetail,c.channel_st channelState from lfs_channel_info c where c.channel_num=#{channelNo}

select a.product_num from (select t3.product_num from lfs_userrelationptgroup p, lfs_agent t, lfs_productrelationgroup t2, lfs_product t3 where p.user_num = t.agtno and t.agt_phone = #{agtphone} and t2.product_state = 1 and t3.state = 1 and p.group_num = t2.group_num and t2.product_num = t3.product_num and t3.business_num = #{businessType} and t3.trade_face = #{tradeface} limit 1

select tg.channel_num,tg.product_num,tg.end_price,tg.product_cost,tg.channel_price,app.app_name,bs.weight, info.adapter_name from lfs_channel_to_product tg left join lfs_channel_to_group bs on tg.channel_num=bs.channel_num left join lfs_channel_info info on bs.channel_num=info.channel_num left join lfs_app_info app on app.group_channel_id=bs.channel_group_id where app.agt_no=#{agtPhone} and tg.product_num=#{productCode} and info.channel_st=1 and tg.state=1 and bs.weight>0 order by end_price asc
